item.title: A Lawmaker Blasted a Hospital’s Super Bowl Ad. Then He Changed His Tune.
item.description: NYU Langone Health aired a commercial showcasing its doctors during the Super Bowl. A North Carolina congressman wondered if it was a waste of money.

item.title: Weinstein Accuser Tells Her Story of Coerced Sex for a Second Time
item.description: Miriam Haley, one of three women who prosecutors say were victims of Harvey Weinstein, testified at his retrial in Manhattan.
